1019660.name: Battle Princess Madelyn - The Soundtrack
1019660.description:
Now you can enjoy the beautifully haunting tracks from retro audio master, Gryzor87. Battle Princess Madelyn's soundtrack is a modern twist on video game audio of the past. Listen to the beautifully rendered and authentic retro-arcade tracks and then listen to them again in their fully orchestrated form. Submerse yourself into the world of Princess Madelyn and her faithful ghost dog companion, Fritzy.

Arcade Mode Soundtrack

> Songwriter: Gryzor87
> Composer: Gryzor87

> Total playing time: 43:41.320
